text: “Serengeta onsookeyo e Girugaali10:8 Girugaali kye kifo mu Kanani eyasokerwa okuzimbibwa awasinzibwa (Yos 4:19-24).. Nnaakugoberera ne nzija gy’oli okuwaayo ssaddaaka ez’ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa n’ebiweebwayo olw’emirembe, naye oteekwa okunnindako okumala ennaku musanvu okutuusa lwe ndijja gy’oli ne nkutegeeza eky’okukola.”
